title: Five Number Summary: Keeping Up with the Statistics
question_text: The publicity agency for a famous family tracks how many retweets each tweet receives. All tweets from May 4th to October 3rd were analyzed. The amount of retweets (in thousands) is summarized below. Minimum Q $_1$ Median Q $_3$ Maximum @Chloe 47 54 72 82 103 @Cylie 45 77 83 91 105 @Cendall 32 37 66 95 256 Which statement is true?

choices.text: One or more tweets by @Chloe are potential outliers.
One or more tweets by @Cylie are potential outliers.
One or more tweets by @Cendall are potential outliers.
One or more tweets by both @Cylie and @Cendall are potential outliers.
